title: S17 Ep107: Darkness Radio presents Supernatural News/Parashare: Pearls of Paranormal Wisdom Edition w/ Beer City Bruiser
itunes:title: Darkness Radio presents Supernatural News/Parashare: Pearls of Paranormal Wisdom Edition w/ Beer City Bruiser
description:
Darkness Radio presents Supernatural News/Parashare: Pearls of Paranormal Wisdom Edition with Beer City Bruiser!!

As the years move on, and technology gets better, we are able to bui;ld better machines.  Machines to help us see further into space, Machines to help us detect Spirits, and Machines to help us produce brand new gems of all types from al;l different types of materials!  Cruiser and Bruiser jumped on their computin' machines and gathered stories bout these stories and much more this week just for you!

This week,  We find out what NASA has planned for their base camp on the moon, AI wins a State Fair Art Contest, An Ohio man survives being stung 20,000 times by bees, and pearl necklaces... they just aren't for 1950's housewives anymore! 

 When you want to be a better problem solver, therapy can get you there. Visit https://bit.ly/3qkkK8l today to get 10% off your first month.

Check out our new site, https://www.darknessradioshow.com/ to find all of our old archives, leave us a voice message for parashare, read our blogs, and much more!

Find out where Beer City Bruiser is holding his breath and needlepointing near you: https://twitter.com/bcbwinchester
